actions.name: Poison Absorb

cost.trigger: The user is hit by an Poison-Type Attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is hit by an Poison-Type Attack.

Effect: The user takes no damage from the triggering attack and is unaffected by its effects. Then, the user recovers 4 Ticks of HP.
